java/liquibase/database/CacheDatabase.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00004 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseSnapshot;
00005 import liquibase.database.structure.CacheDatabaseSnapshot;
00006 import liquibase.diff.DiffStatusListener;
00007 
00008 import java.sql.Connection;
00009 import java.text.ParseException;
00010 import java.util.Set;
00011 
00012 public class CacheDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {
00013     public static final String PRODUCT_NAME = "cache";
00014 
00015     public String getBlobType() {
00016         return "LONGVARBINARY";
00017     }
00018 
00019     public String getBooleanType() {
00020         return "INTEGER";
00021     }
00022 
00023     public String getClobType() {
00024         return "LONGVARCHAR";
00025     }
00026 
00027     public String getCurrencyType() {
00028         return "MONEY";
00029     }
00030 
00031     public String getDateTimeType() {
00032         return "DATETIME";
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getUUIDType() {
00036         return "CHAR(36)";
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00040         return "SYSDATE";
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00044         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:Cache")) {
00045             return "com.intersys.jdbc.CacheDriver";
00046         }
00047         return null;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public String getProductName() {
00051         return "Cache";
00052     }
00053 
00054     public String getTypeName() {
00055         return "cache";
00056     }
00057 
00058     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn)
00059             throws JDBCException {
00060         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00061     }
00062 
00063     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00064         return false;
00065     }
00066 
00067     @Override
00068     public String getLineComment() {
00069         return "--";
00070     }
00071 
00072     public String getFalseBooleanValue() {
00073         return "0";
00074     }
00075 
00076     public String getTrueBooleanValue() {
00077         return "1";
00078     }
00079 
00080     @Override
00081     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {
00082         return "";
00083     }
00084 
00085     public boolean supportsSequences() {
00086         return false;
00087     }
00088 
00089     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00090         return false;
00091     }
00092 
00093     public boolean supportsAutoIncrement() {
00094         return false;
00095     }
00096 
00097     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00098         if (defaultValue != null) {
00099             if (defaultValue instanceof String) {
00100                 String stringDefaultValue = (String) defaultValue;
00101                 if (stringDefaultValue.charAt(0) == '"' && stringDefaultValue.charAt(stringDefaultValue.length() - 1) == '"') {
00102                     defaultValue = stringDefaultValue.substring(1, stringDefaultValue.length() - 1);
00103                 } else if (stringDefaultValue.startsWith("$")) {
00104                     defaultValue = "OBJECTSCRIPT '" + defaultValue + "'";
00105                 }
00106             }
00107         }
00108         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00109 
00110     }
00111 
00112     public String getViewDefinition(String schemaName, String viewName) throws JDBCException {
00113         return null;
00114     }
00115 
00116     public DatabaseSnapshot createDatabaseSnapshot(String schema, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00117         return new CacheDatabaseSnapshot(this, statusListeners, schema);
00118     }
00119 }
